name: Firefox - Button Icons
description:
Adds icons within Firefox to buttons in dialogs and in other Firefox windows; like OK, Cancel, Apply, Help, Browse, Settings, Add-ons etc...
No External icons/images, Uses images only within Firefox.

You May Also like this style:
style 40211
additional_info:
Compatibility: Tested on Windows 7, Firefox 11, Default Theme. Might work on other OS.

Known Bugs: none.

To Do: More Buttons. Any suggestions?

Update 29/03/2012:
- Initial Release.

Credits:
Thanks to user 7993 for the idea.
